name: My Frogger: Toy Trials
description:
Have you ever wanted to have all of your wildest dreams come true? Well here is your chance! Tobi Inc. is sponsoring a tournament where you must create a toy pet and compete in series of challenges. Team up with Frogger and find out who will be crowned Toy Pet Champion!

Features

• Classic Hop and Dodge gameplay
• Wireless fun for up to 4 players
• Challenging mini-games
